comment.author: 10534752@N00
comment._content:
I cannot establish the date this photo was taken, however, I picked BuNo 131429 up from Alameda overhaul  and  ferried it to  VP-22 in Hawaii on May 13, 1958.  I was the Aircraft Commander and the flight took 11.5 hours.  I later flew it on June 3, and June 25, 1958 from Barber's Point.. It later deployed to Kodiak, AK as the CO's aircraft..
Conner F. Chaney  CDR USN (Ret).
kepkid1@gmail.com
P.S It is a P2V-5F,  not a P2V-7

comment.author: 25623069@N08
comment._content: 131429 VP-22 P2V-5F QA-1 cn 426-5310 in-flight over Diamond Head, Oahu, date unknown.
